name: calendar
description: Create, read, and manage calendar events. Can create new events, list upcoming events, and search for events by date or title.

startDate.description: Start date/time in ISO 8601 format or natural language (e.g., 'tomorrow at 2pm')

endDate.description: End date/time in ISO 8601 format or natural language

calendarName.description: Name of the calendar to use (defaults to primary)

daysAhead.description: Number of days ahead to list events (for list action)

query.description: Search query for finding events (for search action)
